inputs.selection_motivation: GBP/USD moves in tandem with US 10‑year Treasury yields, as USD strength is driven by relative yield differentials; thus the pair is strongly correlated with the benchmark US 10‑year yield.
inputs.candidate_motivation: GBP/USD is driven by relative monetary policy, interest‑rate differentials, and dollar strength, so topics that influence US or UK rates, the dollar index, or other major FX pairs are strong peers or influences.

proposed_link.motivation: GBP/USD moves in tandem with US 10‑year Treasury yields, as USD strength is driven by relative yield differentials; thus the pair is strongly correlated with the benchmark US 10‑year yield.
